title: Regional Maps
subtitle: The average score in each region.
description: This map is a way for you to have a broad feeling of which major french region is most compatible. It further includes statistical breakdowns within regions.

title: Departement level maps
subtitle: Zooming onto departement breakdown withing Regions
description: The within Region variance can be pretty high, as such it is not always informative to only look at the Region-level data.

title: Commune level data
subtitle: A more narrow assessment of Volt compatibility
description: This is much more precise than Region and Departement wide maps, but this still shrouds major differences across neighborhoods.

title: Per polling station breakdown
subtitle: The most fine-grained analysis
description: Leveraging almost never used before geometric contours of polling stations, we were able to make approximate maps at the polling station level.
